pullrequest.title: GraphAlgorithms: add functions for finding source and sink vertices in a DirectedGraph

content.raw:
@{557058:5de38267-b118-494c-aa76-4fab35448816} and I talked about this in person but I'll leave it here for the record.

‌

I like the idea of a `Source(~)` and a `Sink(~)` function. Both functions make sense for graphs. However, the implementation makes certain assumptions about the input graph that aren’t necessary applicable to all potential input graphs that can be passed to these functions. I suggest either \(a\) make this implementation work will all potential directed graphs or \(b\) move these functions to the user space \(sdformat\) where all the graphs are guaranteed to satisfy the assumptions.
